phrs.translation: 老太婆, 格兰艾姆, 格兰丹姆

sentences.sentence: Stone. My grandam gave it to me.
sentences.translation: 这是恶魔石，是我的祖母给我的。

sentences.sentence: It is called Demon Stone. My grandam gave it to me.
sentences.translation: 这是恶魔石，是我的祖母给我的。

sentences.sentence: Wolf-grandam stories are in the air all aroud the world.
sentences.translation: 狼外婆故事是广泛流传于世界各地的故事类型。
